ygData.subject: WOOHOO finaly 115
ygData.msgSnippet: Again WOOHOO 115 skill. Now what? I have gone as far as I can go with Skewers. I wish to have high enough skill to make plate when it does come out, so what
ygData.messageBody:
Again WOOHOO 115 skill. Now what?

I have gone as far as I can go with Skewers. I wish to have high enough skill
to make plate when it does come out, so what can I practice on? I know some
will say banded but I don't want to spend the money on banded and I hate
trying to sell a ton of armor I have laying around. When I do sell banded I
make it to order that way I don't have a ton of armor no one wants.
So what can I do? what will give me a good skill gain?
Has anyone hit the coveted 255?

Thank you for your time

Fezik the decent smith
